skills.name: Corrosive Claws
skills.descriptionraw: Mengakibatkan $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] poin $[D__KEY__ELEMENT] dan menciptakan <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C136021]</color> di area lawan.
skills.descriptionreplaced: Mengakibatkan 1 poin {SPRITE_PRESET#2106}<color=#FFE699FF>Geo DMG</color> dan menciptakan <color=#FFFFFFFF>Corrosion</color> di area lawan.
skills.description: Mengakibatkan 1 poin Geo DMG dan menciptakan Corrosion di area lawan.

skills.name: Crystal Cracker

skills.name: Pursuer's Mark

skills.name: Elemental Devourer
skills.descriptionraw: [Pasif] Saat pertandingan dimulai, Karakter ini memperoleh status <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C136022]</color>.
